basics.name: Advocate General
basics.label: Management Professional in Criminal Justice and Mental Health Disciplines
basics.summary: Over eleven years experience in management in the Criminal Justice and Mental Health disciplines. Proven record of innovative and effective staff development. Strong commitment, vision and leadership.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provides oversight for state operated and private facilities licensed or contracted with the Department of Mental Health. Developed the Advocacy Conditional Release Monitoring Program with immediate success. Carefully analyzing historical comments, ratings and input from consumers allowed to highlight negative trends.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Represented mental health consumers and those with substance abuse issues. Actively participated on committees working to educate staff and public on consumer's rights matters.
highlights: BEST Award (Building Excellent Services Together) won twice.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Established community based supervision programs for Oklahoma County's Regimented Inmate Disciplinary program. Collaborated with Oklahoma Department of Mental Health and Substance Abuse Services and Oklahoma Department of Corrections.
